content: Configure Password Strength Settings to enforce more secure, computation-resistant passwords.

comment.text: Configure Password Strength Settings to enforce more secure, computation-resistant passwords. This message is used in a security settings category, where users can enable password strength settings and learn how it applies.

usage.context:
{t("SettingPasswordTittle")}
 </Text>
 
 <div className="category-item-description">
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400">
 {t("SettingPasswordDescription")}
 </Text>
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400">
 <Trans t={t} i18nKey="SaveToApply" />
 </Text>
 {passwordStrengthSettingsUrl ? (

return (
 <MainContainer>
 <LearnMoreWrapper withoutExternalLink={!passwordStrengthSettingsUrl}>
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400">
 {t("SettingPasswordDescription")}
 </Text>
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400" className="learn-subtitle">
 <Trans t={t} i18nKey="SaveToApply" />
 </Text>
 {passwordStrengthSettingsUrl ? (

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "تهيئة إعدادات قوة كلمة المرور لتعزيز حماية كلمة المرور" doesn't fully capture the meaning of "Configure Password Strength Settings to enforce more secure, computation-resistant passwords." The original emphasizes resistance to computation/cracking. "تعزيز حماية كلمة المرور" simply means 'to strengthen password protection,' which is a weaker interpretation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تهيئة إعدادات قوة كلمة المرور لفرض كلمات مرور أكثر أمانًا ومقاومة للاختراق.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "computation-resistant" is not accurately translated. "Hesablamaya davamlı" translates to 'resistant to calculation,' which doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'computation-resistant' in the context of password strength (referring to brute-force attacks).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing like "hesablamaya qarşı dayanıqlı" (resistant to computation attacks) or "çətindir hesablamaqla şifrəni kəlmələməyə" (difficult to crack through computation).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation uses a slightly informal tone. While not incorrect, it could be adjusted for greater consistency with technical documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more formal phrasing, such as "Daha təhlükəsiz və hesablamaya davamlı şifrələr tətbiq etmək üçün Şifrə Gücü Parametrlərini konfiqurasiya etməyinizi tövsiyə edirik." (We recommend configuring Password Strength Settings to apply more secure, computation-resistant passwords.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "computation-resistant" doesn't have a direct and natural equivalent in Bulgarian in this context. While "устойчиви" (ustoychivi) means 'resistant', it's not the best fit for describing password strength. A more appropriate translation would convey the idea of 'hard to guess' or 'difficult to crack'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Конфигурирайте Настройките за Сила на Паролата, за да наложите по-сигурни, трудни за отгатване пароли.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'computation-resistant' is awkwardly translated. 'Odolných vůči výpočtům' is literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning of resisting brute-force attacks. A more natural translation would focus on the resistance to cracking or guessing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurace nastavení síly hesla pro vynucení bezpečnějších hesel odolných proti prolomení.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'odolných proti prolomení' might sound slightly informal depending on the context. A more formal alternative could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurace nastavení síly hesla pro vynucení bezpečnějších hesel odolných vůči prolomení.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'computation-resistant' is not accurately translated. 'Zuverlässige Passwörter' implies 'reliable passwords' which doesn't convey the meaning of resisting computational attacks (e.g., brute force).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurieren Sie die Einstellungen für die Passwortstärke, um sicherere Passwörter zu erzwingen, die gegen Berechnungen (z.B. Brute-Force-Angriffe) resistent sind.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, 'zu stellen' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing is 'zu erzwingen'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurieren Sie die Einstellungen für die Passwortstärke, um sicherere Passwörter zu erzwingen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'computation-resistant' is translated as 'ανθεκτικούς στους υπολογισμούς'. While technically accurate, it's quite verbose and unnatural in Greek. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'difficult to crack' or 'hard to guess'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Διαμορφώστε τις Ρυθμίσεις ισχύος κωδικού πρόσβασης για να επιβάλλετε πιο ασφαλείς, δύσκολους να μαντέψετε κωδικούς πρόσβασης.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'πιο ασφαλείς, δύσκολους να μαντέψετε' is a bit clunky.  Consider rephrasing to improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Διαμορφώστε τις Ρυθμίσεις ισχύος κωδικού πρόσβασης για να επιβάλλετε πιο ασφαλείς και δύσκολους στην εύρεση κωδικούς πρόσβασης.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'computation-resistant' is not directly translatable and loses meaning in the Spanish translation. 'Resistentes a los cálculos' is too literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning of difficulty in cracking the password.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configure los ajustes de seguridad de la contraseña para imponer contraseñas más seguras y difíciles de descifrar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "laskennan kestäviä salasanoja" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "computation-resistant passwords." While technically correct, it's quite formal and could be misunderstood. A more common and understandable phrasing would be something along the lines of 'vaikeampia murtaa' or 'joita on vaikea arvata/murtua'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Määritä salasanan vahvuus-asetukset varmistaaksesi turvallisempia, vaikeampia murtaa salasanoja.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "computation-resistant" is not accurately translated. 'Résistant au piratage' is a reasonable interpretation of resisting attacks, but doesn't directly convey 'computation-resistant' which implies resistance to brute-force attacks based on computational power.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configurez les paramètres de force du mot de passe pour imposer des mots de passe plus sûrs et plus résistants aux attaques par force brute.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "հաշվարկներին դիմացկուն" (resistant to calculations) is not the most natural or accurate translation of "computation-resistant." It's too literal and technical. A more understandable phrasing is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Կազմաձևեք գաղտնաբառի հզորության կարգավորումները՝ ավելի անվտանգ, բարդ գաղտնաբառեր կիրառելու համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "computation-resistant" is not directly translated. "Resistenti" implies resistance, but doesn't convey the intended meaning of computational difficulty. A more accurate translation would incorporate the concept of making passwords hard to compute/crack.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "resistenti" with something like "difficili da indovinare" (difficult to guess) or "a prova di calcolo" (computation-proof).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "computation-resistant" is not naturally translated as is in Japanese. A more appropriate translation would convey the meaning of passwords being difficult to crack or guess.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: パスワード強度の設定により、より安全で推測されにくいパスワードを強制します。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "計算抵抗のある" is technically correct, it sounds overly technical and unnatural in this context. It's better to use a phrase that emphasizes difficulty in guessing or cracking.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: パスワード強度の設定により、より安全で解読されにくいパスワードを強制します。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "computation-resistant" is not accurately conveyed by "도출하기 어려운". "Computation-resistant" implies difficulty in calculating or guessing the password. A more accurate translation would be something like "계산적으로 추측하기 어려운" or "알고리즘적으로 추측하기 힘든".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 더욱 안전하고 알고리즘적으로 추측하기 힘든 비밀번호를 적용하려면 비밀번호 강도 설정을 구성하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure feels a bit long and formal for a settings description. Consider breaking it up for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 더욱 안전하고 알고리즘적으로 추측하기 힘든 비밀번호를 적용하려면 비밀번호 강도 설정을 구성하세요. (Consider breaking this into two sentences)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ທົນທານຕໍ່ການຄິດໄລ່" (thonthan to kan khitlai) is a literal translation of "computation-resistant" that might not be the most natural or easily understood phrasing in Lao. It conveys the meaning, but it's clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like "ທີ່ຍາກຕໍ່ການແກ້ໄຂ" (thi yak to kan kae khai) which means 'difficult to crack' or 'hard to solve', or "ທີ່ປອດໄພຈາກການໂຈມັດທາງຄອມພິວເຕີ້" (thi pod sai jak kan chomhat thong kompiwter) which means 'safe from computer attacks'. The best choice depends on the intended audience and level of technicality.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a comma. While acceptable, ensuring consistency with other Lao translations is important. Check if commas are commonly used in similar contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify if a comma is standard usage in Lao for this type of description. Consider alternatives like a semicolon or no punctuation if that aligns with the style guide.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'computation-resistant' is awkwardly translated. 'Skaitļošanas izturīgas' doesn't fully convey the meaning. It implies resistance *to* calculation, rather than the difficulty of cracking the password through computational methods.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurējiet paroles stipruma iestatījumus, lai ieviestu drošākas paroles, kuras grūtāk salauzt ar datorsprēžiem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "odporne na złamanie hasła" is a literal translation of 'computation-resistant passwords' and doesn't convey the intended meaning clearly. 'Computation-resistant' implies a password that is difficult to crack using computational power.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Skonfiguruj ustawienia siły hasła, aby wymagać bezpieczniejszych haseł, trudnych do złamania.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a comma (,) separating the two clauses. While not strictly incorrect, a conjunction like 'i' or 'aby' would flow better and is more common in Polish in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Skonfiguruj ustawienia siły hasła, aby wymagać bezpieczniejszych haseł i trudnych do złamania.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'resistentes à computação' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'computation-resistant'. It literally translates to 'resistant to computation' which isn't the intended nuance. It suggests passwords are resistant to being computed, rather than being difficult to compute/crack.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Defina as configurações de força da senha para impor senhas mais seguras e difíceis de serem quebradas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'resistentes à computação' is an awkward and inaccurate translation of 'computation-resistant'. It doesn't convey the intended meaning of passwords being difficult for computers to crack.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Defina as configurações de força da senha para impor senhas mais seguras e difíceis de serem quebradas por computadores.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Configurați setări nivelului de complexitate a parolei pentru a crea parole puternice și le securiza' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Configure Password Strength Settings to enforce more secure, computation-resistant passwords.'  'Le securiza' is awkward and doesn't represent the intent of enforcing security.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configurați setările pentru complexitatea parolelor pentru a impune parole mai sigure și mai rezistente la atacuri.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Configurați setări nivelului de complexitate a parolei' isn't strictly incorrect, it's a bit clunky. The preposition 'nivelului' is not the most natural choice here.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configurați setările pentru complexitatea parolelor

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'computation-resistant' is not accurately reflected in the Russian translation. 'Устойчивые к вычислениям' literally translates to 'resistant to calculations,' which doesn't fully capture the intended meaning of passwords that are difficult to crack through computational methods. A better translation would convey 'difficult to guess/crack' or 'resistant to brute force attacks'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Настройте параметры надежности пароля, чтобы обеспечить более безопасные и устойчивые к взлому пароли.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "computation-resistant" is not accurately conveyed by "පරිගණන-ප්‍රතිරෝධී". A more accurate translation might involve describing passwords that are difficult to crack with computation, rather than directly translating 'computation-resistant'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to convey the meaning of 'passwords that are difficult to guess or crack with computers' using more natural Sinhala phrasing.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure feels a bit convoluted. It might be more readable to break it up into two sentences.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider separating the sentence into: 'වඩාත් ආරක්‍ෂිත මුරපද සඳහා මුරපදයේ ශක්තිය සැකසුම් වින්‍යාස කරන්න.' and 'මෙය පරිගණනයෙන් ඔප්පු කිරීමට බැරි මුරපදයන් ලබා ගැනීමට හේතු වනු ඇත.' (This is just a suggestion and might need further refinement to accurately convey the full meaning)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'aby používatelia boli nútení zadávať bezpečnejšie hesla odolne voči útokom' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'to enforce more secure, computation-resistant passwords'. The phrase 'odolne voči útokom' (resistant to attacks) is not the best translation of 'computation-resistant'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte silu hesla, aby používatelia museli zadávať bezpečnejšie hesla odolné voči výpočtovej sile.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'boli nútení' is a bit awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing would be 'museli zadávať'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: museli zadávať

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'computation-resistant' is not accurately translated. 'Odpornih na vdore' literally means 'resistant to intrusions' which doesn't convey the intended meaning of being resistant to computational attacks or brute-force cracking.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurirajte nastavitve moči gesla za uveljavljanje varnejših gesel, odpornih proti računalniškim napadom ali silovitnemu preskusu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation uses a comma separating the two parts of the sentence. While grammatically correct, using a semicolon (;) might improve readability, especially in a settings context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurirajte nastavitve moči gesla; za uveljavljanje varnejših gesel, odpornih proti računalniškim napadom ali silovitnemu preskusu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "отпорније лозинке на рачунарске нападе" is a literal translation of 'computation-resistant' but doesn't quite capture the intended meaning. It sounds awkward and overly technical in Serbian. 'Computation-resistant' implies a password that is difficult for computers to crack through brute force or other automated methods.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Конфигуришите Подешавања Јачине лозинке како бисте применили сигурније лозинке које су тешко разбијени уз помоћ рачунара.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses lowercase 'како бисте' which is grammatically correct but less formal than using capitalized 'Како бисте' in a settings description.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Конфигуришите Подешавања Јачине лозинке Како бисте применили сигурније лозинке које су тешко разбијени уз помоћ рачунара.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "otpornije lozinke na računarske napade" is not a precise translation of "computation-resistant passwords."  'Computation-resistant' implies difficulty for computers to crack, not just resilience to attacks. A better translation would convey that meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurišite Podešavanja Jačine lozinke kako biste primenili sigurnije lozinke koje su teže za razbiti/računarski teže provaliti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a passive voice ("primjenili sigurnije lozinke"). While grammatically correct, the English original is more active. Consider a more active construction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurišite Podešavanja Jačine lozinke kako biste nametnuli/postavili sigurnije lozinke koje su teže za razbiti/računarski teže provaliti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'zorunlu kılmak' (to force) is a bit too strong for 'configure.' It implies a rigid enforcement, whereas 'configure' suggests a setting that can be adjusted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Daha güvenli ve dayanıklı şifrelerin ayarlanmasını sağlamak için Şifre Gücü Ayarlarını yapılandırın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a long sentence, which can be difficult to parse. Consider breaking it up for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Daha güvenli ve dayanıklı şifreler için Şifre Gücü Ayarlarını yapılandırın. Bu, daha güvenli şifrelerin kullanılmasını sağlar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "стійкі до обчислення" (resistant to computation) is an awkward and less common way to describe password strength. It doesn't accurately convey the intended meaning of 'computation-resistant'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Налаштуйте параметри надійності пароля, щоб застосовувати більш безпечні паролі, стійкі до злому.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "computation-resistant" is not accurately conveyed by "chống lại việc phỏng đoán mật khẩu."  "Computation-resistant" implies passwords are difficult to crack through computational methods, which is a more nuanced meaning than simply preventing guessing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Định cấu hình Thiết lập Độ mạnh của Mật khẩu để đảm bảo mật khẩu an toàn hơn, khó bị phá giải bằng phương pháp tính toán.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Độ mạnh của Mật khẩu" is a bit awkward.  While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Độ mạnh mật khẩu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '强密码' (qiang mi ma) translates to 'strong password'. While not incorrect, it's less precise than the original's emphasis on 'computation-resistant' passwords. The original implies passwords difficult to crack using computational methods.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 配置密码强度设置，强制使用更安全的、计算抵御型密码。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a critical error, the phrase '更安全的强密码' could be slightly improved for flow. A slight reordering would make it sound more natural in Chinese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 更安全的密码强度设置
